caption: They began to search for the Trident in the sea. Finally, they found it was hidden in an underwater volcano. The weapon was at the bottom of the volcano, and to obtain it, it need to go through many harsh environments, only the krakens have this power. In order to get the trident, Ruby needed to be stronger, so she decided to go find her grandmother to exercise herself.Her grandmother taught her many skills: how to swim against the current, how to lift heavy objects, and how to use laser eyes. Finally, Ruby successfully arrived at the bottom of the volcano.

global.question: Is it a video based on reality or not?(Is it a cartoon movie?)
global.answer: No. It seems like a cartoon movie.

global.question: Are there more than five different places appear in the video(scene switch doesn't necessarily means a place change)?

what time does the video take place?(at day time or night time?)
global.answer: Both at night and at day time.
